messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Ren's article in HEM and some little bit about Alaska, somehow it's all connected...
messages.msgSnippet: **Ren, I liked your article in HEM s new issue!   Very cool.** Yes!   Ditto! Looking at the table of contents,  it was great to see that so many of the main
messages.messageBody:
**Ren,
I liked your article in HEM's new issue! Very cool.**



Yes! Ditto!



Looking at the table of contents, it was great to see that so many of the main articles were unschooling ones. Cool!

Also, seeing so many familiar names! I'm amidst celebrities! Heehee!



Kelli



Deborah Lewis <ddzimlew@...> wrote:Ren,
I liked your article in HEM's new issue! Very cool.

Since you're always reminiscing about Alaska I thought I mention the
start of the Iditarod today in down town Anchorage. Because of lack of
snow the restart was moved to Fairbanks. Can you believe that? On the
Chena river behind Pike's Waterfront Lodge.

Sigh.

Read more about the trucked in snow and other silliness at www.adn.com
and www.iditarod.com.


Great article Ren. = )

Deb L.

messages.subject: Ren's article in HEM and some little bit about Alaska, somehow it's all connected...
messages.msgSnippet: Ren, I liked your article in HEM s new issue!   Very cool. Since you re always reminiscing about Alaska I thought I mention the start of the Iditarod today in
messages.messageBody:
Ren,
I liked your article in HEM's new issue! Very cool.

Since you're always reminiscing about Alaska I thought I mention the
start of the Iditarod today in down town Anchorage. Because of lack of
snow the restart was moved to Fairbanks. Can you believe that? On the
Chena river behind Pike's Waterfront Lodge.

Sigh.

Read more about the trucked in snow and other silliness at www.adn.com
and www.iditarod.com.


Great article Ren. = )

Deb L.
